title: How to Start Your Side-hustle from Scratch
description:
What can homemade soup teach us about starting a side-hustle?

A whole heckuva lot, actually.

Look, sometimes the options available to us aren’t the best options for us. Or maybe they’re just straight up not good for us.

What do we do? Do we settle for them or do we get creative, roll our sleeves up, and make something new from scratch?

We are in a time where so many of us are being dared to roll up our sleeves, get creative, and find other ways to get what we need rather than just being able follow the status quo.

In fact, one of the most commonly asked questions we receive is, "How do I start something from scratch? What if I have 0 experience doing this whole work from home thing, or don’t consider myself a business woman?”

If you've been wondering the same thing, or even just find yourself feeling a little curious, tune into this episode to learn the 6 "ingredients" you need to start something small on the side, where you are, with what you have, before you have it all figured out.

Sign up for the Coaching Workshops here: theownitacademy.com/workshop-series
author: matt@jordanleedooley.com (Jordan Lee Dooley)
